description:
Sinbad, while using Baal Djinn Equip.
In this form, Sinbad takes on the appearance of a dragon and gets two horns and a jewel on his forehead and an elaborate necklace along with blue scale-like armor over parts of his body and a long tail. In this equip, Sinbad gains the sword of http://anidb.net/ch80566 [Baal], Bararaq Saiqa. The sword has a guard around the hilt similar to that of the claw of Baal with blue scales.
Source: Magi Wiki, edited.
name: Sinbad
